Key: (Hmmm. Is he not over here either?)

Jeez, I can't find him. Where'd that bastard
go?

Wait. Don't tell me he was actually...
Nah. Tonomachi made up the whole
Tengu Cow" story himself."

B-Besides, there's no such thing as ghosts.
Even if there was, I'm not scared of—
N-No... Not at all! Totally fine!

What's the matter, then? Did you find
something over there?

I-I see. Well... I can find him on my own,
so why don't you rejoin the others?
I can't go back on my own.

Well, but you're here all by yourself,
Origami—
O-Okay, then let's head back together.

Well, on our way back, we can head that
way...
You don't look that scared though—
O-Okay, then what would you like me to do?

Here. If you can't move, then hop on my
back slowly—

(I was about to look over my shoulder at
Origami when, all of a sudden, she leapt
onto my back like a professional gymnast.)

Ha... Hahaha. Y-You must've been real
scared, Origami.

(Aah! Because of how tightly Origami's
clinging to me, I can feel her press against
my back!)

H-Hey, Origami? I feel like we've talked
about this before, but... do you feel like
you're holding on a bit too tight?

(Origami's pressing her chest against me.
They might not be, um, big, but I sure know
they're there!)

U-Um, Origami-san...? I-I know you're terrified,
but would you mind loosening up a bit?
Th-Thank you. Now, I can wal—
O-Origami, are you licking my ne—
Someone's coming! Origamiiii! Get off of me!

(I pushed Origami off and she dove into the
tall grass before making a graceful landing.)
O-Origami...?! Wh-What... did you just do...?
I don't remember. I was so scared.

*whimper* That's all you've got to say!
I finally found you.

(Huh...? I don't know if I've ever seen that
expression on Origami's face...)
You took too long, so we came looking for you!
What's the point if YOU'RE getting lost?!
Well, at least we found you safe and sound.

(Oh, yeah... I can't say that I had stopped
wondering where Tonomachi is.)

Mm... Anyway, what were the two of you up
to just now?

H-Huh?! N-Nothing! We were doing absolutely
nothing, right Origami?!
I can't say. That it unfolded as described.

GRRRR! You're horrible, Onii-chan! You were
doing something suspicious, weren't you?!

No! Nononono! I didn't do anything! Hey
Origami! Could you stop spreading rumors?!

Hey! Wait Origami! I thought you were so
scared you couldn't move—

Kotori, come on! Let's drop off our offerings
and head home!

(*sigh*... Damn it, Origami. I've still got
no clue what's running through her mind.)
I wonder what happened to Tonomachi. Boy...
